name: Heaven's Door (feliji, Katyu)
description:
You play as William, a lost child who has been resurrected by an Angel. You must now wander an abandoned village in search of answers, as well as avoiding or killing the monsters that now inhabit it.

Heaven's Door is a very short game made by myself and Katyu within 2 months.

Musics are from The Adventurer's Collection Tabletop Soundtrack by Slaleky.
Links : 
www.tabletopmusic.com / https://slaleky.itch.io/tabletopmusiccom-the-adventurers-collection-tabletop-sou...
